page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: Most people in our area use transport facilities during the day. { {100%}own a car and all use it regularly.{60%}said they often travel by train,{40%}do not. {50%}of those questioned said they use local bus services,the rest do not. { 20%}of those who use the bus feel the sevice is adequate.{70%}think that the local roads are also adequate. The main bus routes are the 386 and 354 to Hertford,Stevenage and Bishop's Stortford. Nearby is Stansted Airport which has recently been surrounded in contraversy because of a proposal to expand it by the government. Only{20%}of the local people agree with this expansion.
